name: Awesome Slushy Smoothie Maker - Frozen Dessert
name_original: Awesome Slushy Smoothie Maker - Frozen Dessert
description:
In the mood for a delicious slushie drink? This game is perfect for you! Awesome Delicious Slushie Maker lets you create colorful, tasty, and unique drinks!

[Features]
-Create your Slushie by pouring, mixing, and choosing your flavor of choice!
-Customize each drink with different cups, caps, straws & labels!
-Save and share your creations with friends and family!

This game is easy to play, which means perfect for all ages! Download today!





*NOTE: This game is free to play but also offers in-game purchases made with real money.
